e: ￹`Ma~`tayo~ `cingra~ `a~ `mi~`harateng~.￺He is not quick in thinking / a bit inferior in intelligence.￻他的反應遲鈍
￹`Ma~`tayo~ `ko~ `tayal~ `nira~.￺His work is done slowly.￻他工作很緩慢
￹`O~ `maan~ `ko~ `saka~`tayo~ `iso~ `a~ `tayni~?￺Why / for what reason are you slow in coming?￻什麼原因，使你來遲？
d.f: ￹￺slow * slow in performing a task￻緩慢
